title: Transformed Into a Hucow... For Science! 2: A Breast Expansion and Hucow Transformation Fantasy
description: Jamie has been trying and trying and trying to become something she's always to nurse her husband at her breasts. But all her efforts so far have been in vain! Then Don appears, acting mysterious and bearing a couple of gifts. One of them is meant to spice up their sex life... and the other is meant to fulfill Jamie's dream. Will the formula Don has gotten a hold of work as advertised? And how will Jamie react when she finds out where it came from? Plus both of them get a pair of massive, gigantic, swollen surprises at the end. Find out in the second book of Lactis Alpha.
author: Beatrice Evenmorne
